channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: Well-timed marketing at its finest. https://t.co/Nmiz7Y3zVE
@EladNehorai That's why landing in NYC turns them dirty so fast.
The question I always have is this: What would Bari Weiss say if the hateful verbal outburst in question had been antisemitic? https://t.co/An0rTETJBy
@SweetCuppinJake אדאנק!
Can any of my Yiddish-reading tweeps translate this tweet? Thank you! https://t.co/pkTxGGf0eV
Meanwhile in New Jersey, the backlash to the backlash against @lavietidhar's forthcoming grand Israeli historical epic is about to begin. https://t.co/5EOAgCVy12
Today in Prager U faculty outrages. https://t.co/vijBchVsiT
Today in ArtScroll scions. https://t.co/ESbl3xH9Ls
@protosemite Why? Was his Yiddish better?
@EladNehorai @tashakaminsky Not her fault; there’s a monkey to blame for her actions.

@protosemite Some folks would Hammer in both the evening and the morning.
@protosemite Luckily my Yiddish is very poor so I’m going to assume the first article is about Lennon and Beatlemania. Given the date, it might be the first such article in any language. Yiddish for the win!

@atrubek I literally wrote an article today about a local school that took a list of 26 values from Positive Psychology and winnowed them to a very manageable 5. Optimism didn’t make the cut, which somehow fills me with hope.

@atrubek That’s a lot of values to keep track of.
@atrubek Anyway, I look forward to your list. I expect I’ll be able to plagiarize most of it for my own use.
@atrubek Self criticism is always cheaper, if less effective, than hiring a proofreader.
Fact: Republicans are pro death, disease, and disability. The only question is why. https://t.co/G0pCkpm54b

@froomkin Note that the headline presents it as a challenge to investigators, rather than to Trump supporters who insist on his innocence.
@froomkin You might want to search how the Times reported revelations of the 18 1/2 missing minutes back in the day, and whether it was framed as a "challenge to Congressional investigators" -- or to the White House.

This is the present Republicans want. https://t.co/yOxnFenPul
And this is of course the corresponding future. https://t.co/T2k8tRrEfM
Some excellent news for those of us toiling in the newspaper mines this evening. https://t.co/WnqKL3XS6h
@EconElan @scalzi President H. W. Bush would be so happy!
@KTS_Stories @scalzi Or is an 80s cover band today.

@scalzi That’s one way to fill your church.
@scalzi Very coincidentally : Now playing — Bright Lights, Big City by Jimmy Reed.
@trekonomics I’d like to believe that he was actually invited to an orgy as he described but it was actually a brilliant Democratic Party psyop that is now having its desired effect.
@typolad “Spill out Thy corn syrup among the nations….”
